title: Exclusive: AI data analytics startup Dataiku picked banks for US IPO, sources say
description: Dataiku, an artificial intelligence data analytics startup, has hired investment banks to push ahead with an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.
content:
Oct 1 (Reuters) - Dataiku, an artificial intelligence data analytics startup, has hired investment banks to push ahead with an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: Google AI Overview appears to block results on searches for ‘Trump cognitive decline’ but not for Biden
description: Google appears to have blocked certain artificial intelligence search results for queries about President Donald Trump’s mental acuity
content:
Google appears to have blocked certain artificial intelligence search results for queries about President Donald Trump’s mental acuity, but will provide an AI summary of the same for former President Joe Biden.

title: Microsoft makes sales chief Althoff CEO of commercial business
description: Bringing together sales with marketing and other functions is critical for Microsoft to lead in the artificial intelligence era, CEO Satya Nadella said.
content:
Microsoft 's top-ranking sales leader, Judson Althoff, has been promoted to a bigger role as CEO of the company's commercial business.
